website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of smart technology and have a large budget, this fan was built for you.
pros: An intuitive model that can be controlled by voice with app
Versatile with 10 control settings and an LED light with 16 brightness levels
cons: Doesn't move as much air as you may expect for the price
Requires some tech savvy to set up, and the app occasionally has issues

customer_reviews.title: RIP Haiku Smart Fan Dreams
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fan at first. Easy install, great aesthetics. Was really excited with how the app allowed me to integrate the fan with my thermostats to control the temperature in my bedroom. BUT THEN....they removed those features from the app. I contacted customer support and was notified that "The haiku L-Series Fan does not support SenseMe capabilities." Lovely, advertised a feature that I bought the fan based on, and then took it away. Downright theft! Just get a decent regular fan with a remote because the smart capabilities of this fan are limited to telling alexa to turn it on and off. Big whoop! RIP Haiku Smart Fan Dreams
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: No senseME, nest.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this fan is no longer a smart fan. The wall controller add on, which is needed to communicate with Nest, senceME technology, temperature and so forth has been discontinued as of summer of 2018 and is no longer available. Therefore the fan is just a Wi-Fi, with app and remote control. Packaging is misleading, but evidently that will be changed at some point according to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: RANDALL THURMAN

customer_reviews.title: Stupidly Overpriced. More reasonable options..
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought one of these on sale after debating for several years. Got it for $550 and cringed even at that price. Now Amazon has them for - - $738. For plastic blade fans not even Made in USA. People, this is a good fan. But it is not worth 738. Even at 550 it’s a borderline crazy impulse buy. BAF must have been impacted by China tariffs, but they have a dumb pricing model. They can still be a premium product but you can’t tell me this much plastic is worth the same as a new iPad Pro....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst smart fan.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason to chose Haiku was to have a smart control. That is the worst part of this fan. WiFi disconnects randomly. The only way to get back it online by resettings circuit breaker. It would not auto reconnect if there is a WiFi reboot, power failure or even internet downtime. After 4 years and multiple routers, it's the worst smart thing in the house. Haiku should fire every single software engineer that write this smart software.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Andrius

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan, Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: When I was recently renovating my apartment I decided that I really didn’t want some big brown thing hanging from my bedroom ceiling. So this time I went white. This thing is amazing. I don’t really notice it against the white ceiling. And it moves a lot of air! I have yet to get it above speed # 3. And while I thought I bought the version without the light, apparently I didn’t. Unlike the fan it replaced, the light in this one can actually light up my bedroom. It also has variable light settings, good thing cuz the high setting is pretty bright. Best of all it seamlessly integrates with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Warendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great Hardware, Bad Software
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought I needed the bigger one, but I'm now quite happy with it. The Android app that is needed to set up the Nest integration is quite buggy. It kept showing the fan as offline even though I could turn the fan and light on and off using the same app. The problem was that I couldn't find it with the Alexa app. Finally worked mysteriously after 2 days. Since I've gotten it all setup, its been a breeze. Installation requires that you're almost eye level with the base of the fan. So make sure you have a solid step ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Akil D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Difficult install and not super quiet
customer_reviews.text: I installed the fan with the shortest option. This could be the reason it was so hard to install. I was connecting wires almost blind as it was very difficult to see behind the big cover. The fan is also clicking occasionally. From the FAQ it indicated that it could be the led ring, which I fixed and it reduced the frequency of the clicking but not completely eliminated it. I've bought and installed 2 other DC motor fans before and they both installed easier with zero issues. I bought the other brand DC motor fan for another room and it proved to be easier to install with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ewe C Tan

customer_reviews.title: Lower priced haiku but awesome as well
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this one on Prime date at Amazon with a nice discount. I'm real happy about it. Works great, makes zero noise, and is very easy to put together. Instructions are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: USC Doctor

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing, should have bought it a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for the fan were good, packaging of the product was excellent. The fan makes virtually no noise on lower speeds. Not sure about the highest speed since I don't need that much wind. Nice to have a LED light that is recessed into the fan body so I don't have to get a ladder out to dust it. Had no issue connect it to Alexa and "she" controls the fan with no issue. Yes, the fan is expensive, but I think this is a clear case of "you get what you pay for". I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs a high quality, low noise fan
customer_reviews.author: Honest Sam

customer_reviews.title: All perfect again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6 weeks in this unit and it's making a clinking/drag noise. I now have to take it apart to correct. Hopefully. Keep in touch. Can't fix. Need to replace. Still waiting on Big Ass warranty to send me new fan. New fan came in. All perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan, but a bit frustrating to install
customer_reviews.text: We love all the features, our only complaint would be that it was fairly difficult to install. It is much more advanced than your standard fan you'd purchase at local hardware store and they've packed quite a bit into a compact space which can be frustrating when installing with the shorter rod. I do recommend getting the wall switch or mounting the controller on the wall, if you're using a internet service provider's router such as Xfinity you may have difficulty connecting to Wi-Fi, we switched out our router with a new one we bought and the issue went away.
customer_reviews.author: B. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I installed 3 of these Haiku L series in one evening.. They were so easy. I installed them in 3 bedrooms by myself. I love them. I wish these cheap versions which are not cheap by the way, still had the SenseMe function. I also wish the led was daylight color 5000K instead of warm yellow white 2700K. It is very easy to use the remote, Haiku App and Alexa integration to control the fan. I love its modern look of white plastic. i will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Cessna89811

customer_reviews.title: Quality fan for the modern smart home.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Haiku fan, the first being the higher end Haiku model in the main living area. Based on the ease of installation and usability of the first fan, and because I wanted another smart home integrated fan, I decided to grab this model for the master bedroom. Again I was impressed with the clear instructions and procedure for installing this fan. The quality of manufacture and usability is top notch. Integration with the Amazon Echo is quick and easy, as well. Solid product, and I will probably get two more for the other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Power module DOA (dead on arrival)
customer_reviews.text: Received the package, installed following the manual (not rocket science). After all the installation steps the fan will not turn on. Called support, after several tests the diagnostic was that the power module is defective! It’s a 600$ ceiling fan that doesn’t have quality control? They will replace the module (in 6-7 days), but my experience so far is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Could not get to work with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I put in a smart GE wall switch and that works great with Alexa. I almost never change the settings, and the remote works great for the fan as does the phone app. I now use the GE wall switch with Alexa to turn it on and off, and rarely change the fan speed settings, and do that with the remote or phone app I also have a Big Ass Fan I6 and it works great with Alexa. Could be my problem, but seems like it should have been be easier than it has been. The I6 was easy.
customer_reviews.author: T Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Caution for downrod extension
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fan however the provided downrod lengths are 6" or 12". Due to my ceiling height I ordered a 22" extension from the manufacturer (not available on Amazon) which it turns out is not compatible with this model. They explained this is a L1 model that is being discontinued and the only longer downrod available at this time is for the newer L2 model. I am now stuck hoping the manufacturer receives the backordered L1 downrods. In the meantime I have a very expensive overhead light.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Holsclaw

customer_reviews.title: Really great fan.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is dead quiet at low speeds, at higher speeds you just hear the noise of the breeze, but absolutely no motor noise or hum. Light is dimmable and provides very good illumination on high, soft light on low. Bought it before the latest price increase and while expensive, if you want quiet, this is a great fan. Also, had no issue integrating it with Google home, and also installed optional wall control purchased directly from Big Ass Fans. Had an electrician do the work and he said it was an easy install, but read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: canuckinma

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a bit over a year. Alexa integration was nice. It's quiet. The light is pretty bright. It is pretty expensive -- especially for a product that only lasts one year. It took a few for the email/online tech support folks to respond. But once they did, they shipped out a new control board pretty quickly. So far I've been happy with the fan, light, wifi control, and their tech support team.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice fan, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fan, very quiet, shifts a lot of air and the blue LED lights showing fan speed is a nice surprise. I wish however that they were not all controlled by remotes. We have 13 in our home and so many get lost / misplaced. Need to be careful when operating remote to shield it from nearby fans as you will end up controlling others in the next room. There is a non-remote control option I believe - must look into that. I have been using 2 outside on the porch and near the sea and they have been reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ceiling Fan - second purchase
customer_reviews.text: This fan is amazingly quiet, attractive, sturdy, solid, hi-tech and it has Wi-Fi capability that allows me to use Alexa to regulate it, turn it on or off or set a timer. The installation was through Amazon's network of suppliers and they did a terrific job. Extremely pleased with the purchase -- and the installation by Cody Malone Services, LLC. Super job by Jeremy. Terrific job.
customer_reviews.author: HJC404

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful minimalist design, extremely quiet and efficient. Love the remote control and wi-fi capability. Only downsides: the blue light that goes on when it receives a command doesn’t work in 2 of the 3 fans I installed: the electrician said it wouldn’t snap into place. Also, he complained about how complicated the installation was: it took 2 guys 4 hours to install 3 (they also removed the 3 old ones).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Well Engineered
customer_reviews.text: This was a new fan for the bedroom, so I got an electrician to install it. He said he has installed "hundreds" of ceiling fans, and he was impressed with the design of this one. He said he would give it 5 stars, so it is hard for me to do anything less. The android app was a bit fussy, but soon my wife (disabled by MS) was turning the fan and light on and off with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Milo Wadlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These fans are really great. I got two of them for my sunroom and they have been wonderful. Quiet beyond belief. I had an issue with one of the controllers, telephoned the company and they helped me diagnose the issue and sent out a new part to fix the fan. One of the best customer service experiences I've ever had. I would highly recommend the fans and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Dok

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is nice quiet and powerful. The light is very directional so don't expect it to light a room well by itself. The problem I have is with the amazon echo. 1/2 the time it says "the light is not responding" or "the fan is not responding." It really annoying because it happens several times per day. When it works ist great. When it doesn't I get mad that I spent $2400 on fans that don't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Appljaxx

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding fan, quiet and powerful, lack of included wall control is the only negative
customer_reviews.text: The Haiku L is an outstanding fan both powerful and quiet. It is of course very pricey and the fact that the wall control is an extra $100 is a negative. In the end the style and performance overcame the negatives of the higher price. I will also say that Big Ass Gans in my experience has excellent customer service and support. Like so many things you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AudiR8Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, sleek design, smooth operation.  Great buy for living room.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan; looks great, works well, very smooth quiet operation. Had electrician set if up since he was putting in new outlets anyway. Wireless Setup on iPhone was easy, though the Regular remote works better. We got an extension kit and it works really well on vaulted ceilings. Doesn’t wobble. But we normally don’t set to max.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Haiku L Series are to die for
customer_reviews.text: Just an outstanding fan! Bought the white one on amazon for our living room and then bought a Hunter Symphony for our bedroom since I didn't think the Haiku L series would work with our slanted ceilings. The Hunter fan was a piece of crap. Very loud. Hunter sent replacement parts which didn't help. After being frustrated with Hunter (again), I realized that I could have the Haiku L series installed in our bedroom since our ceilings had an angle of less than 30 degrees. Just had the installation today and the fan there works great.
customer_reviews.author: mathprof

customer_reviews.title: Love the fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. Would have given 5 stars if they had not put logos - yes, not one but two - on the base. Pretty tacky for such a quality, classy looking product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brancaccio

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far!
customer_reviews.text: The Hailku L fan replaces an old Victorian style. I much prefer the modern styling. We wanted white, so there is no issue with the fan blades made out of a plastic material vs the more expensive wood. It moves a lot of air at slow speed compared to our old fan. Also very quiet. Got the iOS app and Alexa interface setup and working. I saw some older reviews that there were problems with the software, but it is working great for me now. Looks like they got the bugs addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of this fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan, yes it is expensive but in the end, it comes down to the quality and ease of putting it up! The motor is extremely quiet and I like the remote and ease of use. I also put up two other fans that were not Haiku's in my kitchen and the install was almost impossible compared this one. In fact, my mom was so impressed she got me to order her one too, the downside is that I get to be the one that installs it...lol oh well at least they are easy to get installed and work great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Moody

customer_reviews.title: this is a good DIY project
customer_reviews.text: This fan really works well....all the multiple functions are great...and I don't like fans!! However, if changing a carburetor on a car is intimidating, this might be a challenge. However, with that in mind, the instructions are well written and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: tom chatham

customer_reviews.title: absolutely worth the price for a quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely quiet, moves lots of air. Love the fan with a caveat. We're in a rural area without cable internet. The remote control and App control of the fan don't always jive. The app setup a wifi hotspot on my phone, and when the fan is on the wifi connects and I can't get to the internet from my phone until I turn wifi off. So if you're rural call the techs at Haiku before you buy. They're great and have worked on getting solutions every time I've called.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously pretty and a serious performer too
customer_reviews.text: The styling of this fan is just exquisite, it makes the other fans look dumpy by comparison. That is a good news, bad news result as it were. We have two other fans that are now going to be replaced as well! On the performance side we are still in our summer season, and we have tested the fan through a couple of nights sleeping. The "Whoosh" mode is our new favorite for overnight. The LED light also works as expected. We also purchased the installation package from Amazon, and that was a good decision. The contractor was prompt and did well...
customer_reviews.author: J. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Best fan ever purchased. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This Haiku fan is amazing. I never heard the brand before. Turns out they are well known in lighting industry. Our fan installed well, looks great, is stable and consistent. Has extra settings to adjust variable speed and a pulse feature. And, we do use the app to adjust the fan. It's so simple... lastly, it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Filmdirector

customer_reviews.title: They look like airplane propellers
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a smaller fan. This fan does have much more air movement due to its size, but also do to the blade shape. They look like airplane propellers. They are a nice quality plastic which is great for on our outdoor patio! The remote control fan/light is a nice feature too. Both the light brightness and fan speed is variable.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly quiet and balanced
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a modern fan with nice clean lines and wood finish. I saw the entry level Haiku fans at a local store but only saw the black and white models. Amazon had the one I wanted so I purchased it as well as the installation service. I was replacing an old fan that had a broken light fixture. The Haiku is incredibly quiet and the installer did not have to spend time trying to balance the blades. Absolutely gorgeous. To be able to control it from an app via wifi is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Silent. Control via wifi/ app.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the Haiku L fans after thorough research. I love them. One - in my small bedroom, and one - in the living/enterntaining area. They are absolutely silent and they both look beautiful, add a touch of contemporary elegance to my small apartment. I quickly downloaded the app and am able to control both of these with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead
customer_reviews.text: Bought 20170820 and now its dead on the ceiling. Calling BigAss guys now but their waratny looks like I have to pay to have it removed and shipped. That is $600 of junk, maybe the Home Depot fan albeit uglier, was worth the $100 afterall.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: BIG ASS FAN - super consumer
customer_reviews.text: If I could put one in every room I would. I love this fan. Light is great - actually better the higher the fan. I adore everything about this fan, but mostly that it helps my AC/heat more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. I bought one in 2017 for my bedroom, and recently renovated two guest rooms and bought two more. They are sleek and beautiful. Incredibly quiet, and easy to install. Great instructions make it easy for anyone. My company always comments on the beauty of the fan. My sister liked it so much while visiting, she bought one for her husband's office as a Fathers day gift. Keep up the great work on these fans
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Cannot comment on the install as I had an electrician do that. Like other reviewers, I think the white plastic blades look cheap. Might consider doing in a matte white instead of shiny white. However, when turned on and running, this fan is a dream. Sooooo quiet. I use it on the "whoosh" mode and the quality of the air in the bedroom where installed is wonderful. Meets all my expectations. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Oct 2020:  New Model L2 - so only 5 inch downrod is included!
customer_reviews.text: If you have 10 foot or higher ceiling you will need to order longer downrod from Haiku. $30 for 10 inch down tube. I guess older model included 2 lengths to choose from. Bummer. However love these fans, 4th one for us!
customer_reviews.author: SD DogFan

customer_reviews.title: Although this is a beautiful fan, the app and definitely the remote leave ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a beautiful fan, the app and definitely the remote leave a lot to be desired. On the plus side its quiet and really puts out air. On the minus side, the remote never worked! The remote is cheaply made. When I tried to open the battery slot, the whole thing ripped off. The fan's app is not user friendly, constantly updates for no reason, and the settings have to be reset. Now it won't even recognize the fan! It is now either on or off and won't connect to wi fi. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BondsMom

customer_reviews.title: You have to add the app to your phone in order to get the fan to stop beeping
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. It is modern, quiet and moves a lot of air. I don't like that the company forces you to log into their app in order to get the fan to stop beeping when it is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Its great, not worth the $800
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the Haiku Fans (I have 3 of them at home). I just dont think the $200 price increase justifies the value of this gadget. Was about to get a fourth but at this times it was a deal breaker to spend that much.
customer_reviews.author: Pato G.Cano

customer_reviews.title: Love the clean design of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean design of this fan. Operates very smoothly even on high speeds, and only makes a gentle whoosing noise. Remote works well and LED light is nice. Expensive but nice. Have not tried the wireless or see a need since the remote works. Installation was very easy, and like someone else said, took longer to remove old one that to install new one.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Schwartzenberg

customer_reviews.title: By far the best fan we have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Got this fan for the master bedroom. It is the easiest to install! Took me 30 mins TOTAL. It is amazingly quiet and moves a lot more air than our previous larger fan. Would DEFINITELY buy again and VERY HIGHLY recommend! Also, u can control it from your iphone. I had NO PROBLEM connecting it to my and my wife's phone. Again, would very highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dynasys

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: One word AH-MAY-ZING!!! We can't believe how this thing circulates air on the LOWEST setting! And the design is modern, not like that generic fan we had prior. DEFINITELY worth the money 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Blair A Pettyjohn

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Sleak & Quiet Fan...
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what you want a smart fan to do these days....run quietly, efficiently all while working seamlessly with the rest of our smart home devices! We loved it so much, we bought 2 more to install in our other rooms!
customer_reviews.author: thevandinters

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome. Easy installation, took maybe 30 mins. It works with Alexa right out of the box. I see some reviews/people saying that it doesn't, so maybe this feature was added recently. Only downside is it doesn't work with Apple's HomeKit. As far as build quality - yes it's plastic, but its quality plastic. You can't really determine what material it is unless you touch it, and not too many people go around touching fans.
customer_reviews.author: The Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Best smart home improvement purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt able to successfully install the LED indicator at the end. I might need to take it apart and realign it or something, but it's ok because it still works perfectly fine without it so it's not too big of an issue. Otherwise than fan itself is very nice. Sleek, quiet, and efficient. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Arizpe

customer_reviews.title: The finish shows fingerprints and dust more easily than any other fan or light fixture in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The finish shows fingerprints and dust more easily than any other fan or light fixture in the house and at this price point, little issues like that should be considered. Otherwise, super quiet and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: AKFLHXS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Puts out a lot of air. After a few weeks though we do hear a low wobbling noise which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mess

customer_reviews.title: ***Update***
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and lightning. Haiku app is behind on updates so connection with Alexa is fine however, connecting with nest is shady. I bought this product primarily to work with nest thermostat but turned out to be a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, Quiet and Alexa control and smartphone app as long as you are connected to the same wifi point.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Best product support out there
customer_reviews.text: Best product support out there, I had some cranky electrical issues and they worked out a great solution. the support line is worth calling just for the messages and options. Best fan on the market. Silent, extremely efficient (440 CFM / watt), DC motor, LED light, remote control, and iphone ap. Functional Art.
customer_reviews.author: David Penn

customer_reviews.title: Best fans on the market today
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased six of these fans and love them. They are very quiet and extremely powerful. I am replacing every fan in our home with these outstanding products.
customer_reviews.author: Gph75

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haiku is for sure one of the top of the line ceiling fans, quality, durability, design, and now with the convenience of Alexa, is one of my favorites for my interior design projects!
customer_reviews.author: O.Z. Investors, LLC

customer_reviews.title: A very nice fan, almost silent.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent fan, it is not perfectly silent, but very quiet. The remote works great. I installed two of these on the porch and they are great in the summer and generate a nice cool breeze. The light is very bright at full setting, and with both lights the room is well illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Malm

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow directions and install, my wife and I got it done in about 30 minutes. This was our second BAF Haiku from Amazon, well under MSRP. Both work perfectly with Alexa and look great
customer_reviews.author: Laster Family

customer_reviews.title: As an installer, this is a great fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed three months ago. Love it. Quite and moves a lot of air. As an Electrical Contractor, I've installed hundreds of fans in the last 30 years and this is one of the best in design, style and quality that I have seen among all the major brands. This was installed in my own personnel home.
customer_reviews.author: James Linnenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Good product. The only trouble with it is apparent ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The only trouble with it is apparent interference with some other electronics in the house that makes the fan start or stop at random times.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Great for smart home. Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat complicated to install. But not too bad. Really beautiful, great Alexa integration
customer_reviews.author: Kraken

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, lots of airflow, quality smart home features
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and lots of airflow. Small, light, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased - great product and service.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fan and fantastic customer support! Wanted one for a long time and it's even better than I expected. Customer service when I wanted a spare part was fantastic. Quickly took care of me. Our electrician said it was incomparable in quality. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Luckydog

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love these....silent and moves a lot of air...they look great as well
customer_reviews.author: PNW buyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective, and quiet while moving air!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and simplicity if installation. Already had one of their products outside on screened porch. Quiet and amazingly stable at maximum speed. New ability to control with phone app is great.
customer_reviews.author: Intrepid Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan!!! Now my high schooler has programmed it to turn off at a certain time and thus I don't have to worry about lights being left on all the time!!! Plus it looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandhya Rao

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish
customer_reviews.text: As far as ceiling fans go, this install went pretty well. Its a complicated fan, but its well thought out for install. Price is high, but its quiet and well worth it if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Anders Nelson

customer_reviews.title: QUIET
customer_reviews.text: QUIET! Replaced an old ceiling fan in our bedroom that had a hummmmm. Love the ‘swish’ feature that varies the fan speed oh so slightly so that it actually feels like a breeze. The light is really nice, soft. Haven’t used the WiFi feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: This fan is dead silent, perfectly balanced (no wobble) and the LED light is very bright at its highest setting, yet dim-able through multiple levels. The remote control is a lot nicer than dealing with pull-chains. I have not tried the software to control it from a smartphone. I like the modern styling much better than traditional fans with their bulky motors and paddle blades. My only quibble is that the high-gloss finish looks rather plastic-y. (It IS plastic, but a matte or semi-gloss finish might look more fitting with its price.)
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and light
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and it now works with Google Home!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Schuchat

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive remote
customer_reviews.text: The remote control is extremely sensitive. I can’t watch tv bc if i change the channel the lights turn on and the fan. Do not buy. I’d return if iT wasn’t installed.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup instructions were easy to understand, and the fan is incredible!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Simple, Whisper Quiet
customer_reviews.text: We had the 60" version of this in our last house, and bought the smaller one for our bedroom in our new house. It is elegant and simple, doesn't call attention to itself, and is truly whisper quiet. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but GREAT for elderly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 87 year old mom. The fan and the LIGHT Is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Katzi

customer_reviews.title: Staying cool
customer_reviews.text: Thought this time would be too modern, but looks great in our beach house, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Kick-A$$ Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG GREATEST fan ever! It is pricey but SO worth it! Not only does it look really cool, it is incredibly efficient in moving air around! It is so quiet even in higher speeds. We hung the remote next to the bed and it is really easy to turn on/off the light and the fan!
customer_reviews.author: RPipe

customer_reviews.title: this fan does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This fan surpassed expectations. If you want quality and can spend a little more money, this fan does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Visnadi

customer_reviews.title: Except those fans likely don't have a super quiet DC motor
customer_reviews.text: First, it's about 3X the price of the average room fan from a big box hardware store. Except those fans likely don't have a super quiet DC motor, 7 speeds (and "Whoosh" mode), LED light kit, wifi connectivity and built in Amazon Echo voice controls for the fan and light. So, it's feature rich, built in the US and is a snap to install.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ichiyama

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and reliable except
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and reliable except, the included remote needs to remove/reinstall battery to work - like trying to reboot.
customer_reviews.author: TDRG

customer_reviews.title: Great fan worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans! They are intuitive and stylish. Love the smart features.
customer_reviews.author: Green Girl

customer_reviews.title: Greatest fan in the world
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fan. Works with Alexa and because of its design pushes more air than any other fan I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best fan I have ever had, easy to install and operate!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful fan. The Swoosh feature is delightful at night. My brother-in-law was so impressed, he bought us a second one as a house-cooling gift.
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Great fans! Work flawlessly. They are so quiet and boy do they move some air. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t take an engineering degree to put it together but it will take about 45 mins. Once it is hung it is a very good ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome that it works with Alexa but it is no longer silent as it was when it was first installed so I took one star.
customer_reviews.author: Racerx

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Can't see myself getting anything else in the future. looking to the next prime day sale and buy one or two more for the living room area.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Beautiful, easy to install and works well with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie South

customer_reviews.title: Haiku
customer_reviews.text: We loved this fan until the motor died today! Less than two years and the thing is broken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice plastic fan. Light, durable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality; however, it would be nice also have the light to change hue at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Randrup

customer_reviews.title: The bamboo blades are actually plastic but look like bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Moves a lot of air with minimal noise. Looks nice and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Skiver

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but impressive
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fan that does not make noise as it spins. More expensive than other fans but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the quietest fan that I have ever "not heard". Built in dimmable light is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D

customer_reviews.title: Best Fan I Have Ever Owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: This should be a 6 star rated fan. The fan is extremely quiet and moves a lot of air on the lowest settings. I rarely have to use the highest settings. I will be buying another one of these for the master bedroom. I believe the price is reasonable based on the performance of the fan. I can't say enough good things about this fan!!! I have not, nor do I plan to use the WIFI feature. I don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans. We have them outside on our covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: dgb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Incredible fan, I plan to replace all my other fans with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! Looks great in the room
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Looks great in the room! Very efficient. I thought I read some reviews that said it was loud! We don't find it to be loud at all! Would like to have more for the other rooms in the house! Works Great! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, non-obtrusive, attractive fan. Installation went well. Well-designed componentry.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Taylor

product_meta.title: Big Ass Fans Haiku L Smart Ceiling Fan, 52", White
product_meta.description: Size:52"| Color:WhiteThe award winning, elegantly designed Haiku L by Big Ass Fans delivers serious airflow and exceptional efficiency in equal measure. This 52-inch ceiling fan is available in matte black, glossy white, cocoa finish, and caramel finish, adding a touch of modern sophistication to any space. With an integrated LED and 16 brightness settings, you can adjust the light output to fit every occasion. Ten unique control settings allow you to choose the fan speed, timer, sleep mode, and whoosh mode, which simulates natural breezes. The light and fan can be controlled using the included remote, the free mobile app on your smart phone, or via voice control your Alexa enabled device or Google Assistant. Every Haiku L features precision-balanced airfoils and is sound tested to make sure your fan will never wobble, rattle or click. Stylish and efficient, the Haiku L by Big Ass Fans is the perfect comfort solution for all spaces. Please Note: Haiku L ceiling fans require an active grounding wire which may not be present in homes built prior to 1950. This product is for indoor use only.
feature_bullets: FAN SETTINGS: 7 speeds, Sleep mode, Whoosh mode (which simulates natural breezes), eco mode, and Timer
BALANCED: factory-balanced and sound tested to ensure fan will never wobble, rattle or click
LIGHT SETTINGS: integrated LED light kit features 16 distinct brightness settings and emits a warm white color brighter than a 60-Watt bulb
REMOTE: included slimline IR remote is wall mount capable and provides simple, convenient control of your Haiku L fan from anywhere in the room
SMART: included WIFI module allows control with free Haiku smart phone app (iOS and Android) to personalize your fan’s comfort settings, use voice commands, and group with other Haiku products
WORKS WITH: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for voice control (Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant devices sold separately)
COVERAGE: recommended for indoor spaces 15-ft x 15-ft (225 sq ft) with flat or sloped ceilings up to 33 degree pitch 8-ft to 11-ft tall
SAVINGS: save up to 30% on cooling costs with reduced A/C runtime
PERFORMANCE: Haiku L moves 25% more air than traditional 52-in ceiling fans to make you feel up to 10 °F (6 °C) cooler

specifications.Special Features: Works with Alexa, Wi-Fi Enabled, 2 downrods included: 6-inch and 12-inch, Integrated LED Light, Works with Google Assistant, Remote control included
specifications.Warranty Description: Please see attached warranty pdf located in technical specifications.
